choices.D: Test and deploy patches on a focused set of systems.
choices.C: Perform an attack on local systems.
choices.A: Patch systems and software effectively and continuously.

questions.question_text: How can local systems eliminate vulnerabilities?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
Local systems can eliminate vulnerabilities by:

A. Patch systems and software effectively and continuously.

Regularly applying security patches and updates to both the operating system and software applications is a critical practice to eliminate vulnerabilities. These patches often address known security flaws and help protect the system from exploitation by malicious actors. Effective and continuous patch management is a fundamental component of a robust cybersecurity strategy to keep local systems secure.

Options B and C are not standard practices for eliminating vulnerabilities. Option D, testing and deploying patches on a focused set of systems, is related to patch management but doesn't address the "effective and continuous" aspect of vulnerability elimination.

Selected Answer: A
Answer should be A, D makes no sense
A. Patch systems and software effectively and continuously.

questions.question_text: Which Palo Alto Networks subscription service complements App-ID by enabling you to configure the next-generation firewall to identify and control access to websites and to protect your organization from websites hosting malware and phishing pages?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
Pg.169

The URL Filtering service complements App-ID by enabling you to configure the next-generation firewall to identify and control access to websites and to protect your organization from websites that host malware and phishing pages.

Selected Answer: B
B p261
1. Business (goals and outcomes)
2. People (who will perform the work)
3. Interfaces (external functions to help achieve goals)
4. Visibility (information needed to accomplish goals)
5. Technology (capabilities needed to provide visibility and enable people)
6. Processes (tactical steps needed to execute on goals)
All of the elements tie back to the business itself and the goals of the
